column4: what was ur question again, i found the answer for ya, but i dont remember what the question is haha
next to the time on the top, see the volume mixer?
the thing next to the mail
Would like to have the "Update Manager" run  automatically to remind me to do updates - instead of having to remember to do it manually.
Sometimes in general it will come up an remind me but not all the time.
mrmintanet, ur talking about an ISO file?
hmm, so when u open the file or unzip it it auto runs?
stevenx or u can always run from a 1gb flashdrive
i do that from my school computers
lets me access all their locked down c drive files too :D
Thanks - good to go - ubuntu chat support is great!
